11.content:
Name: Haruka Kayoki

Kaiju Name: Call several, Harukazilla, Harukadon, She-Beast, Girlzilla, Kidzilla, and she likes being called a monster. Queen Haruka, Queen of the Monsters

Age: 10, but her powers also stops her from aging, making her immortal

Height: 160ft

Appearance: A fair skin girl with brown hair and blue eyes. Because of her Kaiju transformation, her body swelled up, putting some additional looks to her breasts and butt, making them more curvy.

Powers: An extremely powerful Kaiju roar that can easily scare anyone. It also has the additional power of disabling nearby electronics and causing some destruction from the sound waves. Her body thanks to her mutation makes her stop aging, and she is easily immune to any weapons thrown against her. Breathing underwater, and also has laser breath as well from her mouth.

Clothes: Gonna use these picks as a reference of what Haruka would wear, but is often in a blue bikini outfit,

Pics: https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/saru... and https://www.deviantart.com/erodriguez199...

Side: Neutral with a side of good

Background Info: Haruka Kayoki was just a normal girl who had a pretty basic life. She went to school, have friends, have a loving family, etc. But all of that changed one day when a strange meteorite comet came by and hit Haruka’s home, destroying it. Luckily her parents got out, but Haruka wasn’t quite as lucky as the meteorite hit just as she got out. She was nearly killed by the blast, but then somehow strange energies were emitted from the meteorite and was absorbed into Haruka. She survived the blast but was transformed into a towering young girl who’s body also got a But oversexed by the radiation with powers.

Additional info: This happened when she was just 8 years old, and while it took some getting used to, she decided to use her powers to help the people in Okita, Japan in anyway she can, while also trying to live a normal life as much as she can, just with a monster sized twist of course. The people also, while in fear at first, adore her and they loved her monster side so much, that they call her monster names. She actually likes the monster names a lot, and decided to embrace her Kaiju and kinda goddess status. Everyone helped the girl with food, housing, clothes, etc... and she helped out the city by demolishing, building, etc, soon she embraced her Queen status, and while not in charge, the people would view her as a goddess of some sort. She enjoys the power she had over them, but never abuses it, but still tries to live a good life as much as possible, even if it’s monster size,
11.title: The Giant Child Monster, Haruka

114.content:
"Alright. Are you ready girlzilla." asked a gravely voice.

"I was born ready." Haruka smirked. She loved when General Tanaka invited her over to the military base for testing. It was one the few times she could use her powers uninhibited without fear of demolishing the city.

General Tanaka had been one of her most vocal detractors when she first became a kaiju and wanted nothing more than to exterminate her before she became a major threat. But over time he began to slowly change his tune when he saw how helpful she could be and how the people adored her.

He still wasn't her biggest fan by any stretch of the imagination, but at least he wasn't petitioning anymore to drop missile on her.

Currently she was in the military's battle arena which was reserved for the general's latest weapon tests. Because of how durable she was, she was the perfect test subject for his scientist's latest weapons of mass destruction. Last time she tanked a bunch of borderline nuclear missiles, this time she was unsure what she was facing and excited nonetheless.

----

This time it was the general's turn to smirk from the safety of his testing window. "Well aren't we confident." he then turned towards his scientists. "Release project Monster Hunter."

"Yes sir." one scientist answered.

"Releasing Project monster Hunter." Another stated.

The final scientist punched in a few codes on his keyboard and turned to the others. "Are we sure project Monster Hunter is ready?"

"Of course, advanced statistical analysis says the project is ready."

"You crunched the numbers like the rest of us, how could you have any doubts?"

"General?" the keyboard scientist called. "the last experiment ended in failure as did the other nine. I'm not sure about this."

General Tanaka was silent. "Begin the test. If it fails... then we're all in trouble."

The scientists all nodded. The higher ups were getting tired of their constant failures to produce a kaiju killer, if they failed this time then that meant serious repressions.

"Yes sir." the scientist gulped. "Releasing Project Munster Hunter!"

----

Back in the battle arena, Haruka waited patiently for the test. Her calm composure was rewarded by the lights in the facility going dark and the alarms blaring. This happened whenever a new test was issued. It warned everybody present that shit was going down.

A red light flared around Haruka as she stared at the large steel door. Slowly it began to creak open, white smoke emerging from the other side. She had no idea what was coming, yet she welcomed it with open arms.

It was time to play.
114.title: Project Monster Hunter

1141.content:
"Showtime." Haruka whispered. She was so ready to rampage.

She waited with barely contained anticipation as she continued to eye the white fog. Whatever emerged from their would no doubt be exciting. She lived for exciting.

Then she heard it. The sound of footsteps, large footsteps, fallowed by the sounds of scraping metal. Whatever was coming must have been mechanical.

It wouldn't surprise the young Kaiju if her opposition was mechanical considering she's scrapped more than her fair share of the generals menacing machines.

The only downside was they didn't tend to last very long when she went all out and because of her insane level of durability, she could pretty much tank whatever the dished out.

She could still remember the first time she came to the military's testing facility and they had her fight a bunch of mini robots with experimental blaster technology. From what the general explained, those blasters had enough power to cut through 12inches of metal like a hot knife through butter. Yet, they didn't even burn or break her skin. Needless to say he was pissed.

That's how all his tests went. He'd bring in the latest... whatever, and she'd either tank it or destroy it. Either way the outcome was always the same... Girlzilla wins.

Haruka was broken from her thoughts when suddenly the footsteps went silent. The kaiju didn't know what to expect, but all of a sudden the alarms stopped blaring and the lights retuned to normal. All that was left was the white fog and what was concealed within.

Just what was in there?

From inside his window the general and scientist looked on with anxious expressions. This was it.

Haruka tightened her fists in preparation and met the glowing red eyes of the automaton.
1141.title: Calm Before the Storm

11413.content:
Build your own robot
----------------------------

1) A robot Haruka


2) A scorpion themed robot


3) More options
11413.title: Build your own robot

choices: Haruka discovers a new power during the battle
114131.content:
Haruka looked on as a metallic hand reached through the fog and gripped the metal doorframe. So she was right after all, another robot for her to scrap. Knowing that made her smile, the general was about to hold another 'L' in his chest.

Another hand reached out to grab the other side of the doorframe. Whatever kind of robot this was, was sure taking it's sweet time. This slow pace kind of reminded her of when she fought the general's tanks.

She'd seen turtles that moved quicker.

Haruka was starting to lose her patients now. "Would you just hurry up!"

As if the machine had herd her demand, the metal menace broke through the fog. When it did Haruka was left stunned. Ever since she first came to this facility she'd faced numerous robots and weapons... but never had she faced a machine version of herself.

This iron maiden looked almost exactly like her, minus the metal frame. Neck-length brown hair, glowing blue eyes, and curvy in all the right places. She even wore the same swimsuit as her outside of the color change. Bloody crimson to contrast against her sky blue.

What the heck was this!? Haruka turned away from the metal pretender to the general's window. "Mr. Tanaka!? What the heck is this!?"

"Imitation is the most sincere form of flattery. Every other trial before this led us all to the same conclusion, nothing we built could stand against you. Your body is the perfect war machine, and what better way to harness that kind of destructive power than to mold our latest creation in your image."

Haruka didn't know weather she should be flattered or angry, maybe a little bit of both. She never signed on for a mirror match. She hated mirror matches. Especially when she was still small and could play video games and her father would mess with her by picking the same character. She hated that.

"Fine." Haruka huffed before turning back to her iron double. "It doesn't matter if she looks like me or not, I'm gonna send her back to the scrap heap!"

Stream seemed to shoot from the metal Haruka's ears, the sound reminiscent of a tea kettle. "Error. This unit will send you back home crying."

"It talks!?" Haruka breathed before getting serious. "And it talks trash."

"Who added a trash talk feature?" General Tanaka sighed.

"Me sir." one scientist admitted. "We had parts leftover and I didn't want them to go to waste."

"Fine. Just as long as Project Monster Hunter (P.M.H) can get the job done." The general then locked eyes with the kaiju. "Let the battle trial begin in 5... 4... 3... 2... 1... GO!"
114131.title: Mechaharuka

1141311.content:
To say the general and the scientist were stunned would be an understatement. The horror in their eyes combined with their slacked jaws conveyed the message that they were not just stunned, they were embarrassed. The 'fight', if could even be called that didn't even last five minutes.

Girlzilla stood triumphant over their latest with her arms crossed and her foot planted firmly on the automaton's chest. She wasn't even injured, tired, or sweating, she just looked victorious like she always did when going head-to-head against their latest creations. Once again they had failed.

"General? What do we do?" A scientist asked with dread in his voice. That dread was shared by the rest of his colleagues and for good reason. This was their last chance and constant failure would be met with severe consequences.

For a minute, there was nothing but silence. The general could still hardly believe what he witnessed. One punch. That's all it took to fell project monster hunter. Girlzilla managed to snuff out almost a years worth of hard work and dedication with one blow.

General Tanaka looked back at his scientist with mechanical slowness on par with the scrap currently under the giantess Kaiju's foot. "See her out and send the trial data to high command."

"Sir?" the keyboard scientist asked.

"Just do it." the general ordered. "There's no sense in keeping her any longer and there's no use in delaying the inevitable. Get her out and send the battle data."

"As you wish." A scientist said sadly.

----

Back in the arena, Haruka basked in her victory. Once again she'd sent another bucket of bolts back to the scrap yard where it belonged. When would the general learn he could never invent anything strong enough to defeat her?

Although, maybe she shouldn't have gone all out and destroyed the metal monstrosity in one hit? Normally she'd drag things out a bit but her hatred of mirror matches demanded she end things on the spot.

Still, she could only imagine the general's face right now. He was probably foaming at the mouth at how quickly she dispatched his mechanized monster. Serves him right. Next time he won't try to copy her like that.

"H-hello!? G-Girlzilla!?" A voice rang below her. Looking down by her foot she noticed one of the general's scientists calling up to her with a megaphone.

"Yeah?"

"The battle trial is over now. T-the general said to see you out." he explained.

Haruka smiled before removing her foot from the robot. "Oh don't worry, I can see myself out."

With that she began walking away through an open slide door.

"W-wait--"

"Next time tell the general that he'll have to come up with something more original if he wants to beat me! Bye-bye!"

She was gone... leaving the lone scientist with an almost broken frown. "What next time?" he whispered.

----

Up in the window the general sat by a computer screen with a blank expression, his men huddled behind him. Each of them anxiously awaited a response from high command for their embarrassing defeat.

"What will happen to us sir?"

Will we be terminated?"

The general turned towards his scientists. "I don't know."

A message then popped up on the screen.

General Tanaka's face remained stoic as ever as he read the message.

"What's it say?"

"It says that as of today, all of you are being reassigned... and I'll be going up to high command for a hearing." he answered, shocking his men.

"Reassigned!?"

"Where are we going!?

"It doesn't say. All I know is that come tomorrow, nothing will be the same again."

Nothing.

----

Haruka yawned before giving her body a good stretch. Playing with the general was fun, but she was ready to call it in early. Looking up at the sky she could tell she'd been at the base for a while. The sun was setting and the sky was bathed in orange.

It was time to swim home and rest. Maybe next time General Tanaka will come up with something that'll give her a challenge.
1141311.title: Battle Trial Failure

11413111.content:
General Tanaka hadn't slept well, in fact he hadn't slept very much at all. All he could think about was yesterday's miserable failure and the fear and disappointment on his men's faces. Because of his failure as a general they were reassigned to god knows where and he was trapped here at this hearing waiting to see what would become of him.

This was all because of that damn Kaiju girl. No matter what he tried or how much he strategized, none of his creations could so much as hurt her, let alone defeat her. Project Monster Hunter was supposed to be his magnum opus, the culmination of everything that came before. It was supposed to leave her crying and ensure the future of technological warfare. Now it was scrap and he was back to the drawing board.

"General Tanaka?" a meek voice called. "It's time for your hearing."

The man nodded and straightened his tie. "Let's get this over with."

He pushed open the double doors that stood before him and entered the private office. Inside was the chief of high command and a woman he had the rather unfortunate circumstance of knowing. The man was chief Sakurai and the woman was head scientist Junko.

Chief Sakurai sat behind his desk while Junko stood beside him with her clipboard in hand. "I trust you know why you're here General Tanaka?"

"Yes sir." bowed.

"Rise." Sakurai ordered. "As a general your duty is the safety and protection of the people, correct?"

Tanaka nodded.

"It is because of your role that you were given a private division and men capable of creating any project you saw fit. We gave you a base, men, resources, and near unlimited funding. Yet none of your creations bore fruit. Then when this... this, freak shows up on our doorstep, you can't even take her down!"

General Tanaka looked down in shame. "We did our best sir!"

"Your best was not good enough!" he growled. "We have a living breathing 160ft female monster living in our city that could rampage at any time if left unchecked and time and time again you fail to deliver a contingency plan! That girl is a danger to Japan and herself! The fools just can't see it yet! They're blind to this girls size and 'charm'."

"I know." Tanaka answered. "We've tried numerous times to take her down or find a weakness with our battle trials and--"

"And yet time and time again you fail to deliver results." Junko interrupted. She pushed up her glasses before continuing. "Your job was to make sure in the event this monster ever lost control she could be contained or taken out. Instead she's made the military and your division look like chumps."

Tanaka tightened his fists. "We did our best. That girl is a scientific mystery. Nothing we created could even break her skin. All ten battle trials only confirm that Girlzilla might just be invisible."

"I disagree." Junko said casually. "Everyone one has a weakness, you just have to find it and push."

"It's not that simple." Tanaka argued. "The battle data--"

"That's your problem. You rely too much on the numbers, general. All ten of your battle trials were based on the data crunched from previous encounters and recorded footage from news copters as well as estimations. You let the math dictate your next course of action and as such you failed."

"Do you realize how ridiculous you sound!?" The general asked in disbelief. "The numbers are everything."

"Fool." Sakurai cut in. "Why play the odds when you can make them?"

Tanaka looked confused. "What are you saying, sir? The numbers--"

"Enough!" Sakurai shouted. "No more excuses about the numbers! I'll hear no more of it!"

Junko smirked. "Despite your string of failures, your last one wasn't actually as bad as you believe it to be."

"What?"

"Project Monster Hunter wasn't a bad idea on paper, just in execution. Which is why I believe with a little tweaking, we might just have ourselves the perfect war machine."

Sakurai's eyes narrowed. "Tell the man, Junko."

"As of today you work for me now general and you'll be aiding me with my personal project. Monster Hunter 2.0. I'm going to turn your chicken shit into chicken salad, understand?"

Tanaka grit his teeth. "I understand."

"Good." Sakura sighed. "Now get out of my office both of you. I have a lot of work to do and by extension so do you."

Both saluted. "Yes sir."

"Oh, and Junko?"

"Yes sir?"

"Don't fail me." Sakurai said firmly.

Junko simply smiled while Tanaka grumbled. "Wouldn't think of it."
11413111.title: By the Numbers

choices: Junko meets Haruka in the city
The general begins work on a secret project
114131111.content:
As the pair left high command, Tanaka couldn't help but scowl. Sakurai was a fool if he saw it to ignored the battle data. Numbers were everything, they dictated the best course of action on the battlefield and most likely saved more lives than anyone would ever know. So say that they didn't matter was just ludicrous.

Then there was Junko. He couldn't stand this woman. Everything about her simply rubbed him the wrong way and the way she could suck up to people made him want to puke. Not to mention he'd been a witness to some of her more... covert projects. Needless to say the woman had no morals. If she was heading a new monster hunter project then that meant nothing good for those involved.

"So what exactly is your plan?" Tanaka pried.

Junko smirked. "All in good time general, all in good time. Anyway, why don't you head back down to base while I make preparations."

"For what?"

"Why, for first contact with the enemy of course." Junko giggled. "I want to meet this Kaiju girl face-to-face."

"Why on earth would you want to do that? Surly your time would be better spent behind a laptop?"

"Tut, tut, tut, general." the head scientist mocked. "No need to get all dramatic. I'll get behind the screen when I'm good and ready. For now be a good little grunt and do as your superior demands. Head back to base while I go confront this big bad threat to national security."

The general grit his teeth. "Yes sir."

"Good boy." she teased. "Now run along."

The general did as he was told, but not with a few muttered curses under his breath.

"Such an amusing little man." Junko remarked. "Now it's time to meet this Girlzilla and get this show moving."
114131111.title: Phase 01

1141311111.content:
Haruka leisurely skipped through the city streets, causing all manner of quakes with her reckless actions. All around her was the blaring of car alarms and cheers from the people below. Despite the destruction she caused the citizens of Japan still adored her. She could knock over a tower on purpose and they'd probably still sing her praises.

"What to do what to do." Haruka wondered as she stopped in the middle of the road. Her sudden stop had caused the cars behind her to crash into her foot and stockpile on top of one another. Miraculously no one was hurt. Instead they were in awe of who they hit. Some of them even began to take pictures.

"This is insane." someone said, watching the entire scene play out. That someone was none other than Junko herself, dressed in her more casual attire as opposed to her usual scientific one. "It's like the people here are hypnotized. She shows up, breaks things with little regard for her actions and the peoples safety, and yet they act as if her just being near them is an honor."

That realization made Junko giggled. The people were ridiculous and their favorite Kaiju was as irresponsible as she could be. She probably didn't even realize what a danger her size represented in this little city. Ignorance was bliss.

"I can't wait to kick start project monster hunter 2.0. That girl will do wonders for me." she smiled as she watched the giant take a seat in the road and pose with a few cars in hand for the locals. "They really do love their monster genre in this country don't they."

Oh well, it was time to move.

"thank you, come again!" Haruka waved. "Anyone else want a monster photo?"

"I do called a woman from the back of the crowed. She was a buxom blond in a red sweater with blue eyes and... were those cowboy boots? "I'd like a monster photo with the cities resident giantess."

"Sure!" Haruka smiled what's your name?"

"Oh my names Junko, Sayo Junko." she answered. "And you're Girlzilla, right?"

Haruka smiled. "That's me. So what kind of photo do you want?"

Can I get a picture of me in your mouth like you're about to eat me. It would look great on my desktop." Junko smiled.

Haruka looked elated. Not a lot of people chose that pose. "You got it!"

Perfect.

Haruka handed her cellphone to nearby civilian and asked them to take the shot. They of course nodded not wanting to say no to a beautiful lady and the blue swimsuit clad giant.

Girlzilla lowered her head. "Hop in!"

"As you wish." Junko said causally before hopping into the wet and smell maw that belonged to the giant. To anyone else this would a terrifying experience, not to mention gross as hell, but Junko loved it. There was just so much DNA in here to steal. Her body was literally being saturated in it. She pulled a small vial out from her pocket and quickly began to scoop up some samples.

"Are you ready?" Haruka asked.

"Ready." Junko smirked.

The civilian took the picture of Junko pretending to look terrified while Haruka played the part of an hungry predator. Despite the sinister intent behind this, the scientist supreme found the whole experience quite enjoyable.

The kaiju let her down and she wasted no time swiping back her phone. "Not bad." she casually remarked about the photo. Perhaps she really would put this on her desk top?

"Sorry about the drool." Haruka apologized nervously.

"It's no problem. You keep being awesome!" Junko grinned before giving the girl a thumbs up.

Haruka returned it. "Will do!"

"Good." and with that, Junko disappeared into the crowed.

"She was so cool." Haruka cheered. She then turned her attention to the line in front of her. "Okay, who's next?"
1141311111.title: Face-To-Face

choices: The general and Junko depart to see the U.S. project
Focus in Haruka in the city
11413111111.content:
Junko was just smiling just as she was driving right back to the military base, knowing that she just got some samples of Haruka’s drool which is sure to contain some DNA for her to look at. As she was just getting back to the main base of operation, she goes to see the general Tanaka, who is of course annoyed and pissed. He was having is arms against the wall, knowing he is being mocked by the fact he has to work with the scientist Junko, but she seems happy to tell him.

“Well hello there my friend.” Junko said with a bit of a smile on her face, and the general sighed. “How is everything back in the base?”

“Not in the mood to say, but fine I guess. So, tell me what trouble did you went through.”

“Oh you wouldn’t believe what I did today. I went and saw the giant 10 year old swimsuit clad Haruka, a.k.a. Girlzilla and got a picture with her with me as the terrified girl about to be eaten by her. I know she is a good girl and has done a lot for the people in Japan and is a worldwide sensation, but at the same time she is so reckless. Where she walks, the ground rumbles, and plenty of near accidents and vehicles gets wrecked. So careless for a girl her age, along other things.” Junko said just as she show the pic on the phone.

“Well, nice for you.” The general said, kind amused by the situation that Junko put herself in to embarrass herself.

“But that is not all, in fact... its get better. During this, I was drooled on by Haruka, and I used that to get plenty of samples of what I am sure is to be DNA.” Junko said, showing the vial with the sample inside, which got the general to look at it.

“Interesting. Maybe I could see where you are going with this. I know the U.S. has done something quick similar, only with cloning technology.” The general admit, impressed by Junko’s effort. (https://www.writing.com/main/interactive...) (reference here)

“Well let’s just say that I have something big planned in mind. But I think where you failed is actually quite in an area you didn’t expect. You see, we need to actually need to understand Haruka a little bit more, and not just in her powers and size that we obviously see. We need to see the DNA side of it, and even kinda try to be her ally a little it.” Junko giggled before the general snapped at the thought of being the giant’s ally.

“YOU SHITTING ME?????!!!!!!!” Tanaka snapped in anger, ready to take it out on Junko, almost lashing out but Junko push him to the side.

“Well think of it like this.... we need to try to win her over as a friend, and perhaps get her to open up to us a little bit more, and to actually see that there is more than just her, and what not. Basically, we need to understand Haruka. As a person, as a kaiju, etc. See what the people think of her, and perhaps use that as an advantage in our project.” Junko then explained just as she starts looking on the sample on her laptop.

The general had a thought for a moment, and then he signed and reluctantly agreed. “Very well, we will try to be friends with the giant, perhaps opening up to her a little bit could be of benefit to us.”

“Yes, and also, that is what me and the head superior’s were discussing earlier before the meeting. Rather than actually try to be an enemy or a tester to Haruka, we need to be her friend so we can understand her more and make our project, and when our project is ready, we will be ready to send her home crying and have her death with immediately, and when she least expects it.” Junko then added. “Know the enemy.”

“Well its getting late. We have to be departing for the U.S. soon, as they are going to show a test of their kaiju.” The general added as he remembers he has an event to attend to.

“Well yes, and I am a fan of what they are doing from what I saw so far, but my project will be... quite special.”

So what happens now?
11413111111.title: Understanding the Plan

choices: She is going to demolish a part of the city for reconstruction
She is gonna test some clothes they made for her
She is gonna visit some of her friends
114131111112.content:
Haruka is kinda of a strange beast to say to the people of the Japan. She knows she is popular and what not, but so much to where they don’t care about the quakes and damages that she does to their vehicles as she stomps around the city all because they love her. Haruka was always mindful of being careful not to crush on stuff intentionally, though stomping around Japan is always a treat and fun thing for her to do. Maybe its because of her body maybe, bigger breasts, cuter butt, or just the sheer size and power she has that the people secretly live in fear of her, knowing she could snap at anytime.

But if anything though, she is a nice person at heart. She is a big help to the cities of Japan, and is massively popular around the world, so much so that other places across the world are trying to make monsters like her to compete with her. It would be interesting to see her making friends with other giants like her, and also nice as well. It was only two years since she became a giant, but the city and Japan changed a lot to help her. Like with specially made roads that she often goes on unless doing a shoot like she did with Junko, the island home off the coast of Japan, etc.

But they are things that she has to do today, and after her photoshoot with the vehicles, she gave her bikini a once over and proceeded to stomp in a certain direction, but where is she going?

One job that she always loves to do, and on rare occassions, the people and government of Japan would ask her to destroy some buildings for reconstruction. This is easily her favorite thing to do, as it lets her be the monster that she really likes being, and its a favorite treat for the people of Japan to see the giant child monster “terrorize” Japan.

Another thing she tends to do is head to a specially made building for Haruka where they are making clothes for her to try on, mainly swimsuits but she doesn’t mind being in just swimsuits all the time. The other outfit she likes surprisingly is a school girl outfit, even though people would look up her skirt, but she knew that would happen. It is fun also to be a giant school girl monster also.

And finally, she also constantly checks up with her friends from her previous school and at the play park where Haruka or as the kids call her, Harukazilla is a massive attraction and is beloved by children. Its also how Harukazilla got her giant monster names also.

So what will Harukazilla do right now?
114131111112.title: Harukazilla’s invisible reign on Japan

1141311111121.content:
Haruka smiled gleefully after her impromptu photo shoot, as fun as it was to pose as a monster, it was another to act like one. And act like one she would once she reached her new destination. Apparently she was needed to level a part of the city for some new reconstruction project.

She honestly didn't mind, in fact she could hardly wait. A chance to put on a show and rampage like a best? How could she be anything but excited? She loved whenever she got the chance to go out and be a true Kaiju. That raw feeling of strength, power, and broken metal and cracked earth under her heels.

Just thinking about it made her feel all warm and fuzzy inside. "I can hardly wait."

As she leisurely skipped through the city she could hear the sounds of glass shattering and the honking of horns. She was causing all kinds of mayhem with her footfalls but was careful not to destroy anything or anyone important. No, the ground and surrounding windows will have to suffice until she reacted the demolition sight.

"It's Harukazilla!" a bystander cheered.

"Harukazilla is here!" another mused.

"Quick, take a picture before she walks away!"

The giantess up above couldn't help but chuckle. The people really did love her. The movies totally got it wrong. People were supposed to freak out and the army was supposed to show up and blow everything to hell. Instead the army let her do whatever and the people wanted her autograph.

The monster's life was truly the one for her.

Eventually she came across the demolition sight where as usual, Mr. Watanabe was waiting for her. The older man in the yellow hard-hat gave her a grandfatherly smile before turning towards the area. "It's all for you!"

Haruka grinned as she eyes the land. "It's all for me?"

Watanabe nodded as did the rest of his crew and more than a few civilians.

"Destroy it!" the all cheered.

Oh she would destroy it alright.
1141311111121.title: Deconstruction Gal

choices: Haruka goes about the rest of her day
Back to the general and scientist
11413111111211.content:
Haruka eyed the office complex before her hungrily. It was a rather large and ugly white building that stood chest high with her. She remembered seeing it more than a few times when she was smaller and parents told her it's where boring suits went to file papers. Oh, and the pay sucked.

That was more than enough motivation for her to destroy it. Anything as boring, oppressing, and ugly as this place had to go. The giantess grinned as she cracked her knuckles. It was time to play.

She casually walked up to the aged structure and ran her hand across the smooth roof. Even though the building was smaller than her, it was still much wider. It would take time to destroy this, and she honestly didn't mind. She was about to put on a show.

Haruka took a deep breath... and shot a wave of flame at the structure.

The roof instantly caught fire which caused the giant to smirk. She jovially skipped around the building, causing small tremors on ground below. She then raised her hand up and smashed the side of the tower.

The people on the ground were in awe of the destruction. Watching Harukazilla go to work was like watching a great matador. She was damn sure good at what she did.

"Good riddance I say." Watanabe sighed as he watched Harukazilla start to level the offending building.

"I concur." a nearby civilian agreed. "I worked there for ten years and the pay sucked!"

Well that didn't matter now as Haruka drove her foot through the building's core, leaving behind a massive hole. Surprisingly though the building held. Everyone half expected that kick to make the structure crumble. But no, it continued to stand tall.

Haruka clicked her teeth. This building was a lot tougher than she gave it credit for. She was trying to level the building in one hit. Well there went that plan. Fine, if the building wanted to be difficult than the show would continue.

Haruka drew her arm back and gave the building a sort of karate chop.

The burning structure offered little resistance to the blow and began to tremble. Fire roared through the openings and cracks but yet again the structure refused to fall.

"That's one tough old bird." Watanabe commented with wide eyes. Normally whatever Harukazilla hit fell down.

"You can say that again." A construction crew member answered back. "They don't make'em like this anymore."

Haruka was getting rather annoyed now. She'd kicked, chopped, and even set this building on fire and yet it simply refused to crumble. What was this building originally, some sort of nuclear fallout shelter?

It was ruining her reputation.

The Kaiju growled and took a massive step back. There was no way she'd let this building embarrass her any further. It was coming down now. Haruka dug her feet into the ground... and charged.

The building couldn't hold on any longer and Haruka smashed her way through. The tower was little more than rubble and broken glass now, as it should've been.

Haruka turned to face her adoring public and yelled, "Ta-da!"

Silence.

-clap-

-clap-

-clap-

The crowed began to shower her with praise. No doubt the internet will tell the story of the giant versus the tower for weeks to come.

----

"Not bad, freak."
11413111111211.title: The Giant vs The Tower

choices: Harukazilla wants to level something else
11413111111212.content:
"CANON BALL!" Haruka cried.

A large shadow fell over the abandoned neighborhood. What was once a collection of homes was now a rundown mess of rotting wood and rusty scrap. To be quite honest if it could be compared to anything it would resemble a dump or an atomic bomb testing sight.

How appropriate considering there was kaiju sized bomb falling from the heavens.

The poor row of houses down below never stood a chance as they were instantly flatten beneath the massive rear of the giantess. The shockwave from the impact was so powerful a large gust of wind and debris kicked up into the air, instantly destroying anything in it's path.

"Oh my god! Hit the deck!" Watanabe called as he and the surrounding civilians ducked down behind cover. The massive typhoon of dirt and debris brushed right over them and any cover was left pulverized by shrapnel. Thankfully no one was injured.

"Holy crap!" A civilian breathed. "Tell me someone caught that on camera!"

"I did!" Another groaned. "I caught the whole thing."

"Awesome!"

"That girl." Watanabe sighed before turning his attention back to the destruction.

Haruka meanwhile giggled at carnage she called. All around her houses and roads were smashed to atoms. She literally dropped down with the force of an atomic bomb, minus the radiation.

She left the entire surrounding area in ruins, except for the houses in the distance that did survive. That was good. The fun wasn't over just yet. She then turned her attention back to the crowd and was beyond pleased to see everyone recovering and snapping pictures.

It was easy to forget about them when she got caught up.

Smirking to herself she slowly rose to her feet and winked at the crowd. *ROAR*

The sound was defending. The loud roar of a beast ready to destroy. She then turned to the houses off in the distance and launched a laser beam from her mouth. In a flash the remaining houses were wiped off the map in a megaton explosion.

*ROAR*

"KAIJU!"

-clap-

-clap-

*KAIJU*

-clap-

-clap-

The crowd was getting into it as they usually did when she leveled parts of the city. It did her heart good to know she could have fun and appease the people at once.

"You all liked that, right!?" She asked.

"Yeah!" they answered back.

"You wanna see more!"

"Yeah!" they screamed.

"Then watched this!" She grinned before miraculously spying a few shops that managed to survive her controlled rampage. She wasted no time running up to the awaiting building, shaking the earth with each step. She eyed the convenient store with hungry eyes and slowly raised her foot in the air.

"Crush it!"

"Stamp it out of existence!"

Who was she to disappoint her fans. Slowly she lowered her foot onto the structure and she could feel the bricks pressing against the underside of her foot. All it would take was a little pressure.

She applied just a little force, and the building crumbled beneath her.

"YES!" the crowd cheered.

"I swear, this girl is something else." Watanabe lightly smiled. She certainly made his job easy. All he had to do was ring her up, sit down, and collect a paycheck.

Best. Job. Ever.
11413111111212.title: Haruka A-Bomb

1141311111122.content:
Haruka sighed in relief as she stretched her muscles. That photo shoot took way longer than expected, but hey, anything for her adoring public. Besides she got to try a few new poses she'd been working on and got to put that cool lady in her mouth.

Once all that was finished she gave her loyal fans a goodbye wink before heading off to one her favorite places... Silk. It was a clothing store that specialized in specific designs and used only the finest materials from all over the world. It was also the only spot in Japan that could make her some actual clothes.

She tried to special order clothing from other places before, but they either couldn't do it, were too cheap with the material, or were simply far too expensive. Those were the dark ages were she was forced to constantly were nothing but her bathing suits.

Just when she was about to resign herself to her fate to wear nothing but swimwear, her friend Yumi told her about this fancy store in town called Silk that made all of her daddy's clothes. She remembered Mr. Kubo's fancy multicolored suits and thought to give the place a shot. After all it wasn't like she had anything to lose.

When she first arrived to place an order and told them her measurements they weren't even shocked. They just asked what she wanted it made out of and told her when they'd be finished. She was quite honestly the only one that was shell-shocked.

One problem that did arise though were the prices. She might've been a celebrity but she wasn't made of money. Her pockets weren't as fat as her friend Yumi's. But she was in luck. Silk knew who she was and cut her a deal. If she became their spokesperson then she'd get clothes for half off. She couldn't say yes fast enough.

She'd been a loyal customer and spokesperson ever since. She drew up business like nobodies business. Which led her to right now. Seated in front of Silk while Ms. Sato and her seamstresses brought out her order.
1141311111122.title: Dress to Impress

choices: Haruka wants to buy some new shoes
Back to Junko and the general
11413111111221.content:
If there was one other thing Haruka enjoyed as much as her Kaiju status, it was anime. More specifically, school anime's.

She just loved the drama and characters, and more importantly their school uniforms. Japanese school uniforms hadn't really changed much over the years and had become a staple of the culture.

So much so that they even reached other countries through means such as movies, anime's, cosplays, and video games. They had become a part of pop culture all around the world.

Especially the schoolgirls uniform.

That white sailor-style outfit with the blue skirt and ribbon. Haruka adored that look. She could remember the first time she'd ever set eyes on outfits like that. Her mother was going through her old VHS collection when she came across her old Sailor Moon episodes that she recorded off T.V.

Haruka could remember just sitting down with her mother and watching anime. She could recall Usagi running down the sidewalk with her cute little buns and that white and blue uniform.

It was love at first sight for the future Kaiju girl. Then she would transform into Sailor Moon and had an even cuter modified version that made her look so cool.

From that day forward the Japanese schoolgirl's uniform was forever burned into her brain and into her heart. So it was an absolute joy when she got to wear the Kaiju-sized version Silk put together for her.

It just felt so comfortable against her skin and it was snug and colorful. It was the standard white and blue with a red ribbon. It made her feel almost like a high-schooler herself.

Now she was an 160ft schoolgirl and loving every second of it. She thanked the people over at Silk and headed off into town...
11413111111221.title: Suit Up

choices: The three are interrupted by Yoshiko!?
1141311111123.content:
The giantess grinned like mad as she carefully maneuvered through the city streets. She was just so excited to head to the park and meet up with her old friends from school.

Ever since she became a Kaiju and worldwide attraction, they hadn't had much time to hang out like they used to.

At first everything was all weird with her being huge and them being tiny, but miraculously they found a way to make it work. Despite the protests of a few parents and teacher that didn't understand.

Yumi and Ami were simply the bestest friends she could have ever hoped for. They even gave her nickname Harukazilla after she used her size to give that bully Yoshiko an atomic wedgie. It was a moment no one would ever forget. The way she dangled the blonde by her knickers with her fingers was legendary.

But over time moments like that became less and less. Haruka left school, Ami's family moved to a different part of Japan, and Yumi was occupied with being groomed to run her family's business one day. The fun and games were over.

But... then those rare days happened. Haruka wouldn't be obligated to do anything, Ami would stay in town for a few days visiting her grandparents, and Yumi was free to actually be a kid again.

It was almost like having a class reunion except is was just the three of them and no Yoshiko to rain on their parade. Speaking of the evil blonde, she really needed to remember to look her up to see what happened to her. She seemed to just vanish after that atomic wedgie.

Who knows, maybe she just left Japan all together?

Oh she could dream.

The giantess remained lost in her thoughts until she spied the park. Haruka's grinned returned full force as she picked up the pace. The closer she got the more bubbly she got. There were only two people there, two very familiar people.

"AMI! YUMI!" she called.

"Haruka!" they smiled back.
1141311111123.title: Meet Up

choices: The general spends time with Haruka
The general tries to sabotage Junko
114131111113.content:
It had been a few since General Tanaka and Junko returned from their trip to the US. Needless to say getting to experience their own Kaiju's power as well as their technology for the future was very eventful.

Junko made sure to take a mental note of everything she'd seen and would maybe apply some of their techniques to her own project. The general was very much the same, although he wouldn't admit to her. He still hated her guts. That was fine so long as he didn't fuck her.

The general aside, Junko was eager to get back to work with Harukazilla's DNA. The first in depth viewing nearly made her head spin. Never before had she seen sequences like this. This girl wasn't just a mystery like the general described, she was a scientific marvel.

Whatever that meteorite did to this girl had almost completely rewrote her DNA and turned her into a walking weapon. No wonder Tanaka was having so much trouble taking her down, she damn near invincible. She was 160ft tall, had a sonic roar, stopped physically aging, could breath underwater, etc.

Junko was almost salivating at the amount of information a simple bit of drool could tell her. That combined with all the info the general gleamed from his battle trials only made want to put that much more effort into Project Monster Hunter 2.0.

Currently the general was out getting friendly with Harukazilla as per her directive. The man of course was vehemently against it, but a little threat to high command was more than enough to get him to play ball. All the information he brought back with him everyday only served to move her plans forward.

The giant had become comfortable around him, and to make sure she didn't get suspicious, she was still occasionally brought back to base for some pointless battle trials against some of her failed experiments.

As Junko finished recording the day's data, the sound of slide doors filled her ears. She turned her head to see the general walking in with his ever present scowl and a cup of coffee in his hands.

"So how'd your playdate with the giant go?" Junko teased.

The general grumbled before taking a sip of his coffee. "Fine."

"Just fine?" Junk asked. "No talks about her hopes and dreams this time?"

"No." the man said flatly. He wasn't used to being interrogated.

"Fine. Don't tell me." Junko said unconvinced. "Anyway, I've almost cracked this girl's DNA. Give me another month or so and I'll be reading it like a manga panel.

"Really?" the general questioned. "What if you find out you've only cracked the surface?"

Junko grinned before turning back to her computer. "The more information the better. And besides, I would think you'd root for me to get this done so you can stop playing nice with the enemy."

The general grumbled. "Whatever. It's getting late so I'm heading out. Try not to fall asleep at your desk this time."

"No promises." Junko waved off.

"Freak." Tanaka said under his breath as he left the lab. As he walked to his car he couldn't help but think about the last few weeks he spent with the giantess. Originally he'd seen her as a threat to his city and himself, but now he wasn't so sure.

The Kaiju girl was a bit irresponsible, yes, but he'd been able to help correct some of that by just talking to her and being around her. She was still a klutz and at time broke something, but it was never on purpose. So far she was as innocent as she came across on T.V.

Was he... having second thoughts?

No...never.

She was the enemy... and he would see to it she was neutralized.

Even if... she wasn't that bad.
114131111113.title: Back to work

1141311111132.content:
The general seems conflicted, and wanted to take out Haruka, but doesn’t know if she wants to, but his distrust for Junko is becoming even more apparent than ever. She was now experimenting and trying to crack the cold to Haruka’s DNA that she somehow managed to obtain, and wondered what she intends to do with the DNA sample when the time comes. Is it possible that she might use it herself to become a giant, or maybe something else entirely. The way that Junko acts sometimes seems like she wants to do something vile and evil, and the general wasn’t gonna to have it.

He went to his briefing room and immediately contacted his superior Sakurai at the first chance he got. Tanaka wanted to hear his opinion on something on the matter. The video call shows Sakurai somewhere out of the country and he look at the general who contacted him.

“Well hello there general Tanaka, how is the project coming along this time?”

“Well whatever project she is doing, I am assuming she is doing well. She gave me the incredibly embarrassing job to befriend the giant monster girl Haruka as she got a sample of her DNA that she is trying to crack. I can show you the proof in a bit, but let me ask you this, do you really trust the idea of someone with a sample that can turn themselves into a giant at their own will if they wanted to. I mean I liked what the Americans did with their project, but I don’t know if we should go this route.” Tanaka complained with a grunt, in which Sakurai can only reply with a bit of a smile, knowing he mentioned something useful.

“Well, I will admit the U.S. project is impressive, and I get your opinion on the matter of having to trust a girl like her, but you got to realize that this is a very serious problem, if we can’t find a way to either control the girl or terminate her, then we could be in danger. But... I kinda figured you would attempt this.”

Tanaka then replied surprised, and in anger. “What, how did you know. I would attempt this?”

“Because I was keeping in touch with them throughout this entire thing.” The woman named Junko said, appearing with the sample in her hand. “I am still currently working on this, but I can assure you, I have good faith in the project I am making will surely either control or defeat her. Besides, I been having him befriend her a bit in order to get info on why the people love her so much. She might be a klutz, but she may be good, but we all know that we have to deal wit her. And besides, I will tell you know what we are going to use this sample to make a kaiju of our own. Think of it like this... if we can’t defeat Haruka normally, maybe a kaiju like her can.”

“Interesting... see Tanaka, maybe if you didn’t trust your trials all that much, maybe you could have found an idea that would work. I actually approve of this, and actually that is the issue of all of your failures. You try to do it normally with human tech, when in reality, we needed to find a way to use the DNA from Haruka in order to make a being that will be her equal. Besides the saying this, if man won’t kill god, then the devil will do it. Junko, I am very pleased with your report. Tanaka, trust her on this... and we will have not only the girl taken out, but also a monster we can use to ensure our nation’s safety. I must be going, see you soon.” Sakurai said before he closed the video call.

Tanaka was now completely furious, the idea of making a giant monster to face a giant monster. Not only the damages that would be unleashed on the city, but ruining his pride as a general to take it out by any means necessary with what they have. He wouldn’t attempt this at all. His attempt to rat out Junko failed, since she was a step ahead of him.

“I figure you try to rat me out, so I told him already an idea of this, and he liked it.”

“Well lucky you here... I hope you are happy with this. But mark my words, you won’t get far with your project, and when it fails, and it will, you will be sorry.” Tanaka snapped just before he left the office room in disgust. Junko had the upper hand, and now her plan to make a kaiju that can rival Haruka is now in action.

What happens now?

11413111111321.title: A receipt for success, or disaster

11413111111323.content:
Tanaka was fuming, how could Sakurai actually approve of Junko's biological experiment? Did he really not see the danger of brining another monster into the world?

Harukazilla was damn near invincible and another human being walking around with that kind of power spelled disaster. What if the power went to their head and they couldn't be controlled?

Images of a dilapidated city filled with blood, darkness, and despair came to mind. He'd had dreams like that. Dreams where his home was burning and he was powerless to stop it.

Junko was playing with fire here. Monsters couldn't be controlled. Monster could only bring death and destruction. That blonde bimbo was going to get them all killed, and worse, his short sighted boss approved.

He couldn't let this happen. He couldn't just sit idly by and allow his superiors to bring about the end of the world. All those innocent people on the outside wouldn't stand a chance.

He had to do something, but what? He couldn't steal the samples with all this security around, and if he did he would be labeled a traitor and threat to national security.

He couldn't kill Junko either as everyone would put two and two together and have him arrested on the spot. He couldn't try to appeal to Sakurai again either as the man was wrapped around Junko's finger.

Tanaka growled in frustration. Nothing he thought of could work. It's just like with his damn battle trials, no matter what he came up with he always failed.

Maybe... maybe Junko and Sakurai were right? Maybe he did rely too much on the numbers? But he couldn't just discard the facts. The math didn't lie. Even now, the numbers dictate Junko's plan equaled massive failure. Failure that would cost them all their stars.

What could he do now?

Apparently the general wanted to meet up with Harukazilla in the person to discuss a huge matter with her. She didn’t mind, as she always wanted a challenge to see what he can come up against her. She makes her way to the market location to see a helicopter with the general inside.

“Good, I am glad you made it here.” He said, a bit grimly. He didn’t wanted to drag Haruka into this mess, but he knows he needed to warn her.

“Well somehow she got a sample of your DNA and is cracking it. Didn’t know you drool on her, but she got something out of it that concerns me. Your DNA, she is for some reason preparing to do something with that DNA from you. Meteorite energy something something, and I am concern for the people in this city, and that of the world. Look, I know you and I don’t get along all that well, but... I am warning you that I think Junko is going to do something crazy with that DNA, I don’t know what, but... you may not be the only one who is a giant.” The general explained all that he could say.

Haruka then also thought of something with a smile. “Well if you were looking for a way to challenge me, perhaps another monster like me could work, the irony of it all.”

So what happens now?

1141311111132311.content:
After discussing the matter for a few more minutes and enjoying a good laugh, it was finally time to part ways. The two still didn't know what to fully expect when Junko finished her project, but what they did know for certain was nothing would ever be the same again.

"Well it's about time I got back home, my parents will start to worry if I'm out too late." Haruka explained with a smile, though the general could tell there was something else behind it.

"I understand, Just be careful out there." he warned. If Junko's plans really did come to fruition, then it would be up to the two of them to neutralize the threat. How ironic, the enemy of the enemy was now his... friend?

Haruka giggled "Don't worry, I will. If this Junko lady really does make another monster like me, I'll clobber them!"

For some reason hearing that eased Tanaka's mind ever so slightly. "I'll hold you to that. Remember to keep in touch if you see anything strange and I'll do the same."

"Thank you."

With her peace said, the giantess continued her trek back home. Tanaka didn't know what it was about the way she thanked him, but it left him feeling more hollow than anything. It almost sounded like she was saying....

No! His mind was just playing tricks on him. She was too young to understand something like that. He pushed her words to the back of his mind and took off into the skies. As he did he couldn't help but think about Junko and the future of his country.

That woman could not be allowed to succeed.

114131111113231113.content:
Junko smiled devilishly as she leisurely made her way down to her new lab. Sakurai had finally given her project the greenlight and now she could really get the ball rolling.

As she entered the elevator leading to the lower level of the military facility she couldn't help but revel in her own success. She still just couldn't believe how easy this all was.

The general practically eliminated himself from the equation with his constant failures, earning her instant favor in the eyes of the brass, and allowing her to pick up the pieces he'd left behind.

The kaiju girl Haruka was so innocent and trusting that she never once saw through her mask to see her true intentions. Getting that monsters DNA was, no pun intended, child's paly.

Cracking it was a lot more difficult she could admit, but in the end just like everything else she conquered it and turned it into a resource to further her own agenda.

Junko pressed the last button on the elevator panel and began to whistle as the doors closed. In about a minute or two she'd be able to make history with the project of the century.

The giantess wouldn't stand a chance against her latest and greatest creation. A monster to end all mounters. A creature with a burning hatred for the kaiju idol.

There really was nothing like a steady diet of hatred and revenge to motivate someone. It was a fuel that could push people to do almost anything, even sell their soul.

The elevator came to a stop with a ding and the doors began to slide open. Junko whistled a sweet whistle before walking down a long and dark corridor, the only light coming from the end of the hall.

The blonde scientist entered the light and into her new lab. It was a large space filled with all kinds of computers, chemical equipment, and her own personal coffee machine. There were no staff members though, she didn't need the for this.

The only other thing of not in this rather large space was the giant plexiglass window that lead into another equally large space. It was an all white room with nothing inside except for cameras, and small reinforced steel table. On said table was a black sheet covering the individual she'd chosen weeks in advance.

The scientist supreme smirked before walking over to the glass window and placed a hand against it lovingly. "It was time to finally put an end to all the waiting and make the magic happen.

Junko walked over to a nearby closet and pulled out a mask and two latex gloves. She then entered a mini fridge that housed a long test tube filled with an orange liquid. To think in her hands right now was the next step in human evolution.

"I have the power of god, in the palm of my hand." she whispered. She walked over to a table and opened a drawer. Inside was a syringe. A syringe that she used to extract the orange mixture. She too eyed this lovingly.

She held it close and entered the other room. She confidently waltzed over to the table with the black cloth and gently peeled it away to reveal the girl underneath. Junko smiled as her emerald eyes slowly flittered opened.

"Is it time?" she asked tiredly.

Junko nodded. "It's time."

The girl understood and looked down at the syringe. "Is that it?"

"Yes. This'll help you grow all big and strong." The blonde answered before gently taking the girl's arm. Carefully she found a vein, and pressed the needle inside. The girl winced slightly but didn't complain.

"Will I finally get even with that girl?"

Junko smiled and injected the fluid. "You'll have your revenge and then some."

She retracted the needle and pat the girl on the head.

Vengeance would be hers soon enough...

She couldn't wait for the slaughter...

When anger and revenge get married, their daughter is cruelty...

Oh! Junko couldn't wait.
114131111113231113.title: Greenlit

choices: Tanaka posts pictures of the project online
1141311111132311131.content:
Sakurai was a hard man to impress. He'd been a part of Japan's hierarchy longer than Tanaka and Junko combined, so to say he'd pretty much seen everything there was to see would be an understatement of an understatement.

But then there were those oh so rare moments that would make his his eyes pop. Just like the first time he laid eyes on the 160ft menace known as Haruka. That was a moment that would be etched into his memory forever.

What he was seeing now though, would sit side by side with that memory. It had to be about 170ft tall if not more so. Looking up at this behemoth, he couldn't help but be rendered near speechless.

It was as big as Harukazilla and covered head to toe in some kind of cybernetic armor. On the hands and feet were sharp silver gauntlets and shin guards, the torso was armored up as well with the a glowing reactor in the center, and the face was covered by what looked like a menacing silver kabuto. Overall the monster looked like a big metal samurai.

"Wow." Sakurai breathed from the other side of the glass. He'd lost track of how long he'd been staring at the girl in Junko's lab, and the blonde scientist was quick to tease.

"Don't stare too long now or you'll go blind."

That seemed to break Sakurai out of his trance and he did his best to regain his composure. "Right. So what can you tell me about the subject and this... body armor?"

Junko smiled. "Let's just say this girl right here has an axe to grind and will do whatever it takes to put Japan's resident kaiju idol in the ground."

"Alright." Sakurai nodded, leaving it at that. "And the armor?"

"The latest in cutting edge technology. We put roughly 207,724,000,000.00 yen into this cyber samurai armor. The metal is comprised Tungsten and outfitted with all kinds of cybernetics and Nano machines. There's also a few hidden weapons as well. The armor itself was tested against various weapons in our military and a couple of Tanaka's failed projects for good measure." Junko explained. "This girl here... is the perfect war machine."

"Amazing." Sakurai whispered. "So what exactly are we naming our newest asset?"

"I'm glad you asked. This is first generation anti-kaiju weapon... Yagyu!" Junko giggle. "I kinda wanted a name to fit the whole samurai motif."

"I like it. So how long before she's ready for actual deployment?" Sakurai questioned as he watched the giant's head turned toward him.

"She's ready whenever you see fit. She's been waiting a long time to get her revenge?"

That's all Sakurai needed to hear.
1141311111132311131.title: Yagyu

choices: Yaygu's P.O.V. with Sakurai and Junko controlling
11413111111323111311.content:
"Yagyu, I shall now deploy you to Harukazilla Island where you will capture Haruka and bring her back to our base. You have all the powers and weapons needed to take her on. If she refuses to comply to come quietly, use any means necessary to capture her, and if she refuses, kill her. But do this one thing for me, bring her a shame that she will never forget. Is that clear? Failure is not an option, and one last thing, should her parents intervene, take them out to." Sakurai said to the robot as the head nodded up and down. Then, it spoke.

"Yes Commander Sakurai." the robot said, and it had the voice of a young girl. The robot then started to walk out of the base and into the ocean, heading to Harukazilla's island. Sakurai was surely gonna get his vengeance now after Tanaka's continued failure to take her out. He then turns to Junko and smiled. "I think your loyalty and hardwork has rewarded us with a weapon that is capable of taking out Harukazilla." he said to her before he then replies with some new papers in hand.

"What are those?" Junko asked just as she sees these papers.

"Well because of this project, I believe I have a thought of what I plan to do with Harukazilla. We are going to plan to control her, and besides with us merging an actual giant kaiju that you created with cybernetics that we have, we shall have full control of our kaiju."

"Exactly, because with our technology, we will install a microchip on each kaiju, accessing their brainwaves and nerves, letting us control them exactly how we want them to be. Perhaps Harukazilla may be hard to beat, but if we were to tame a monster like her, perhaps we could use her to backup the military and she and Yaygu, plus many more can become monsters for our army. We will never have to send another soldier to their deaths again, we will just send our kaijus, plus we are gonna to make more, right?"

"Yes, a smart scientist like me always have a few other samples to make more monsters with." Junko added, and just as Sakurai and Junko were admiring their project, Tanaka storm into the room, absolutely livid.

"YOU FUCKING BITCH!!!!!!!!! How come I wasn't invited for the demonstration, you were supposed to notify me." Tanaka snapped just as he was heading towards her menacingly, but Junko could only smile.

"I knew you were just hold me back to prove that you are still capable of doing this like a man, but like I said, if man won't kill god, than the devil will do it, and besides, perhaps you will like what I am going to propose. We are actually gonna capture Haruka, and plan to turn her into a cyber kaiju, in which we will have full control of."

"And besides, you failed me so many times, I figure I end up taking matters into my own hands to address the issue." Sakurai also added, seemingly amused.

"Well there is also other problems you should have also kept into mind, like her family, her friends, and also how she is also friends with the public and even the president of Japan, so they could end up intervening on our plans." Tanaka also added as well, but also in a way is starting to kinda admit, that in spite of his hatred for the kaiju girl, he does have a bit of a soft spot for her situation and what not. "Make no mistake, I would personally deal with her if I could."

"And trust me, you are gonna get your chance soon... to control a monster like her, and if she doesn't, she will die, along with anyone that stands in our way. I am also incredibly sick and tired of having to be her friend to the public and with her in real life when I am around her, just to keep my hatred a secret, but now we are about to send a message that unless she gets with the program, they will be consequences, and if you insist, we could take this even further, and have Yaygu take a Haruka battle to the city." Sakurai then threatened with a smirk, which can only mean one thing, Sakurai is corrupt.

"Wait, you can't!" Tanaka gasped as he was shocked of what Sakurai proposed.

"Well for now she is heading for her island, as that is where she resides, but we could take the battle into the city if we really wanted to, and lets be fair, lives will be lost no matter what happens, but they are a necessary tribute for a safer country, especially if we are in control of the kaiju." Junko also added. "And besides, making a monster is so much fun."

"You won't get away with this." Tanaka muttered just before he left the room. The fury in his face that Junko and Sakurai will risk lives to control a monster, that was just low.
11413111111323111311.title: A Sinister Plan

114131111113231113112.content:
The sun was beginning to set on this warm and carefree day, the once blue sky now bathed in a vibrant shade of orange. Japan's resident Kaiju girl Haruka resolved to spend the entire day on her island's beach, simply watching the day go by.

Normally the bubbly girl would be out and about in the city spending time with her friends and fans, but today she couldn't find it in her to indulge in these privileges. Instead she found herself curled up with her knees against her chest and a frown on her face.

She still couldn't shake that feeling in her stomach after her meeting with the general. That Junko woman had pretended to be her fan just so she could steal her DNA, and that scared her. For the first time in her life since becoming a giant she was terrified. What would Junko use her genes for?

Images of other giant monsters and the world on fire came to mind. Sure she was young but she understood what pain and misery were. She'd seen them so many times as a giant when helping out the city or aiding the police. She'd seen death, destruction, and despair. They were some of her motivators to stay positive and help others.

She'd told her parents about her inner strife and they did their best to stay optimistic for her. Maybe the military wouldn't do anything bad at all. Maybe there'd be other giants like her and they could all be friends. It was all sweet and innocent talk that bordered on childish, but it was still a nice thought all the same.

Despite wanting something like that she knew deep down in her heart that that wasn't the case. If the army took her DNA it was because they wanted a weapon. She knew and the general knew it. That's why the man had gone out of his way to warn her of the coming danger.

Just thinking about another girl just like her being used as a weapon of mass destruction made her feel sick. It made her feel guilty. Someone was going to be turned into a big gun that walks and it would be all her fault. All because she couldn't keep her drool in her mouth where it belong.

The Kaiju girl sighed as she looked out at the sun slowly lowing itself from view. There was still light out and she was content to just sit here.

"What am I going to do?" she whispered.

It was then she felt something was amiss. She turned her head to see smoke rising in the distance. "Smoke?" she questioned. Upon closer inspection she saw the black cloud was coming from...

Her eyes widened and she shot up to her feet. She began barreling through the forest, not caring about the trees she toppled or the bushes she crushed. A pit was forming in her stomach and it was only growing with every second.

"Mom!? Dad!?" The giantess called as she burst through the foliage. What she saw made her breath hitch... fire! Fire everywhere! The forest was burning, her home was burning.

Without thinking the monster girl rushed into the inferno and began overturning any debris she came across.

"Mom!? Dad!?" she cried as she searched and searched, but so far found nothing. Tears were beginning to well up in her eyes as she grew more and more desperate to find any trace of her parents.

Why was this happening?

How could she let this happen...?

She was right here the whole time!

Her thoughts where soon interrupted by a horrible blinding light. It was so bright she actually threw her arms over her eyes. Then there was the sound that accompanied it, the sounds of grinding metal.

Eventually the light died down as well as the sun. The only light now was the burning fire around her and the light of the crescent moon. Haruka looked up to see a sight that nearly made her jaw drop and her legs tremble. A humanoid figure slightly taller than herself and covered in armor. There was also and ominous glowing circle in the center of their chest. They also had a helmet that obscured their face and eyes. All in all they looked like a big metal samurai.

Haruka gulped nervously... could this be--? "W-who are you!? What have you done with my mom and dad!?"

The metal titan didn't answer, it just held out it's hand and let the shredded remains of meat fall from it's grasp. Haruka looked on in shock and horror as she put two and two together. This mechanized monster killed... her family!

She let out a vicious roar of pain before without thinking, charging the killer robot. She only took about three steps before she was sent flying through the flames and into the side of a boulder. The monster girl let out a cry of pain and tried her best to sooth the pain coming from her cheek.

The beast hit her and it hurt. It actually hurt. She looked up at the beast with scared eyes as the flames dance behind it, giving it the appearance of a vile demon straight from the depths of hell.

It finally spoke, it's voice cold and mechanical... yet at the same time, familiar.

"It's about time, Haruka. You've made my life a living hell and now I'm going to burn yours to ash. Prepare to die!"
114131111113231113112.title: Haruka's worst Nightmare

choices: Follow Haruka’s Parents on Haruka’s future
Follow Yoshiko as she is rewarded for her efforts
Follow Haruka as she is trapped by the government
1141311111132311131121.content:
“Well what did I ever do to you?” Haruka wined a little bit in pain just as she got up on her feet. “Besides, I would never do anything harmful to anyone with my powers and size. But if its a fight you want, then a fight you will get!” She said just as she had to put the thought of her dead family at the moment and continue to focus at the threat at hand. Haruka charged forward and tried to charge at the giant metal samurai, but then the eyes of the helmet reacted, and then suddenly the robot grabs her arm and twists it, making Haruka roared in pain before the robot grabs her with the other hand by the chest and slams her into the mountain several times, bringing even more pain to her.

“So predictable.” The metal titan girl said just as she walks right up to a weakened Haruka. “I saw that move coming from a mile away. Stay down if you know what is good for you.”

“NO!!!! Not after you killed my family!!!!” Haruka roared just as she got back up and fired a beam from her mouth right at the metal robot girl, in which the eyes reacted again and the core from the chest fired a beam that hits hers, causing a stalemate for a few moments before the samurai’s beam hits her. Haruka was taken back by the blast and was screeching in pain just as she was knocked to the ground. The metal samurai then stomps right over to the weakened Haruka and stomps her metal foot right on her chest, causing Haruka to growl in pain.

“Wondering who is underneath the mask.” She smiled, just before the helmet begins to disappear in a very machine like fashion to reveal the face. A face that Haruka knows all to familiar. Haruka was then in total shock. “No way.” She said.

It was none other than the blonde girl that she gave the wedgie to, Yoshiko.

“Surprised! This is payback for not just that wedgie, but also making me, one of Japan’s most prized idols and popular people with powerful connections look like a fool!” She smiled evilly just as she pulls out an energy sword and brings it up to her chest. “Now this is payback for you ruining my life.”

“Look, I am sorry about that wedgie, and how I made you look like a fool, but trust me, I had nothing to do with your life being ruined.” Haruka said just as she pleas for her life, but to no avail.

“Oh really, well... let’s put it this way... me and my family wanted revenge so badly not for just that incident, but also for the other ways that you have mocked us, which we will get into later, but for now, I think its time for you to rest, as you got a new purpose coming for you.” She smiled.

“Well why did you kill my family, I never did that to you.” Haruka cried.

“Well let me put it this way.” She said just as she grabs the meat once more again and brings it up to her. “The meat that was just a random animal, I just had you think it was your family. Don’t worry, they are safe, but they are getting a good talking to by Sakurai and Junko about you. But for now, I think its time for you to sleep.” Yoshiko responded just by punching Haruka’s head 3 times, and then stomping her face. The young giantess was now motionless almost like a dead corpse. She has been knocked out.

Yoshiko smiled in glee as she got her revenge. “That will teach you to mess with a family with powerful ties to the government, and besides, its fun being this big! I never thought about that.” She smiled just as her speakers play right in her ear.

“Great job knocking out Haruka, now bring her back to base so we can start our next plan, and besides, I have a special reward for you when you get back.” A Japanese sounding guy on the radio spoke. “Yes commander Sakurai.”

Haruka was then carried right by Yoshiko right off on the island, with Yoshiko using her cybernetic implants to fly. Boosters came right out of her feet and she flies into the air. She also carried Haruka with no issues at all.

/

Back at the home base briefing room, Sakurai only had a smile on his face, as he saw the whole operation played out. Knocking out Haruka so he can do something to her later, and even kinda breaking Haruka’s spirit a little by seemingly “killing” her family at first to enrage her, but then revealing that they are alive. Then one of the soldiers then came in. “Sir, the parents of Haruka are here to discuss with you, also Junko and Tanaka are coming as well.”

“Good, time we had a little chat.”
