1141311111132311131121.title: A Useless Fight, and a Sick Sense of Humor

choices: Ken and Mako refuse the deal
Ken and Mako agree to the deal
11413111111323111311211.content:
Confused didn't even begin to describe how Haruka's parents were feeling at the moment. One minute they were at home making dinner and then before they knew it they were suddenly jumped by some men in all black stating they were under arrest. Why? They hadn't committed any crimes as far as they knew.

Then they saw the logo's on the men's shoulders and the conversation they had with their daughter the night before came back to them. They weren't under arrest for any type of crime, they were being into custody so that the military could get to their beloved daughter. They didn't matter in the grand scheme of things at all.

Now the two were sat at a long dark table in a dimly lit room that looked more at home in a police station rather than a military base. No doubt the army was watching them through that tinted window. All of this made them feel sick.

"Ken? I'm scared." Haruka's mother whispered. "What do they want with Haruka?"

Her husband held her close. "I don't know Mako, I just don't know. But we have to stay strong."

His words seemed to calm her down a little, but the worry didn't leave, not entirely. As a parent she'd never stop worrying, even if her daughter was large enough to chuck a tree for miles.

The pair's moment unfortunately was interrupted by the sound of screeching metal. The duo turned towards the door to see four armed guards entering followed by the familiar faces of Sakurai, Tanaka, and... some blonde woman. The guards flanked all four corners of the room and Sakurai took a seat at the head of the table while Tanaka and Junko stood at his sides.

Ken didn't know what was going on but he could already tell this wasn't going to be good. Mako on the other hand was quick to make her voice heard. "Sakurai? Tanaka? Why are we here? Where Haruka? What's going on?"

Tanaka looked like he wanted to say something, but instead turned his head away with a grimace. Sakurai himself however looked more amused than anything else. The same went for the woman.

"Well to answer your questions in order. You're currently in the interrogation room at our B.L.A.C.K headquarters. It's actually quite different from the standard base you're used to. As for Haruka... she's currently in military custody. Lastly there's what's going on... I think that's pretty self explanatory."

Mako's eyes widened in shock while Ken clenched his fists. "Do explain anyway." he ground out.

Sakurai sighed. "I'm tired of explanations. Give them the run down, Junko."

"With pleasure." the blonde cooed. "Your daughter is a threat to national security as well as a throne in our sides. I think Tanaka could attest to that."

The man again said nothing as all eyes fell on him.

"Anyway..." Junko continued. "Because of her immense size we had the general here engage her in battle trials to find the perfect counter measure for her in case she ever lost control, but alas he came up short like he always does. So all duties involving neutralizing your daughter were handed down to me. I am scientist supreme Junko, the head scientist of Project Monster Hunter 2.0."

"Project Monster Hunter?" Mako parroted.

"Correct!" Junko cheered. "After Tanaka last failure I was tasked by our glorious head, Sakurai with finding the perfect counter for your daughter. You see, you're daughters body is like that of a tank. Big, strong, and powerful. But unlike a tank she can think for herself and won't blow up when a few bombs fall. In essence, she's the perfect war machine."

"Are you trying to say you want to turn our daughter into some kind of weapon!?" Ken snapped.

Junko was unfazed. "Got it in one. She could be the greatest wartime innovation since the creation of the automatic rifle or sub-machine gun."

Ken was outraged while Mako looked horrified. She couldn't understand it. How could this woman speaks so casually about another human being like a tool on a utility belt? How could she be so callus?

"You!" Ken pointed. "You said your name was Junko, right? That means you're the one that stole our daughter's DNA!"

"Someone get the man a cigar. Yes, I did steal her DNA. It was so easy too. She just let me get into her mouth and gave me more than enough samples to put my project in motion. Then after a couple of months of work and planning I cracked her DNA and was able to unleash Project Monster Hunter 2.0."

"What do you mean unleash!" Mako questioned.

This time Sakurai took the reigns. "She means we created our very own monster with the DNA Haruka so generously provided, We are now in possession of our own Kaiju and she not only obeys our directives, but she also dominated your daughter in combat before brining her in."

"Monster!" Ken shouted, before he could get up he was bunted by a guard's rifle.

"Ken!?" Mako cried.

"Easy now." Sakurai teased. "We're all friends here... Tanaka?"

The general looked at the parents with an unreadable expression and began. "We're here to discuss your daughter's future as well as cut a deal."

"Deal!? What deal!?" Ken growled.

"You can't have Haruka!" Mako finally snapped.

Tanaka sighed, showing for the first time how tired her was. "Please just listen. Either way the military has your daughter and they're going to do what they want. So this could be beneficial for all of us..." then guards raised their rifles. "Or some of us."

Junko snapped her fingers and then door opened again with a scientist rolling in an old T.V. He placed a VHS of all things in the player and left the room.

"What is this?"

Junko smiled at the woman's question. "Watch. Then well make our offer."

"What kind of movie is this?" Ken asked.

Sakurai smiled before pressing play. "An instant classic."
11413111111323111311211.title: Dangerous Dealings

choices: Tanaka convinces Sakurai to arrest the prisoners instead
114131111113231113112111.content:
Once the movie finally wrapped up, Ken and Mako were left horrified. What they'd spent the last hour watching was an in depth video of the cyberization of Yoshiko. The way that poor girl kicked and screamed from all the scalpels a needles made them both feel sick.

"Now that that's out of the way, we can finally discuss business." Sakurai began, not at all bothered by the gore that was once on screen. "We want your daughter to join our latest creation to aid us in protecting Japan. With the two of them together we can ensure the balance of power will be forever tipped in our favor."

"That's correct." Junko added. "If you willingly sign your daughter over to us, not only will you be doing your country a great service, but we'll ensure that the two of you and any other offspring you may have will be set for life. A nice house by the water, a white picket fence, maybe a pet or two."

Tanaka didn't say anything, both Sakurai and Junko made him sick to his stomach.

"So what do you say? Do we have a deal?" Sakura asked.

Ken was floored. Just when he thought these bastards couldn't stoop any lower. They actually thought they could put a price tag on his daughter's life like a cheap toy. How fitting considering that's what they were treating her like. "Never." he whispered.

"Pardon?" Junko inquired.

"I said never!" Ken growled. "We'll never willingly sign her over to you!"

Mako then made her own voice heard. "That's right. You can't put a price tag on people's lives. Haruka is a person, not a weapon! She has a heart, she cares about the people around her, she just wants to make people smile. You all though, you all are just... evil!"

Tanaka did his best hide his wince while Junko stared blankly at the couple. Sakurai on the other hand looked slightly annoyed.

"Come now. This is bigger than any one girl. This is about the future of Japan. We could build an entire empire that stretches from here to the end of the world. Our kaiju will revolutionize warfare. Haruka could become the greatest innovation since the sub-machine gun."

Ken was out of his seat before Sakurai could even blink. He went to throttle the man only to be slammed down to the floor by a guard.

"Ken!" Mako cried.

The guard aimed his rifle at the downed man. "Try that again and it'll be the last mistake you ever make."

"Bastard!" Ken seethed.

Sakurai sighed. "Why can't things ever be simple. We're trying to extend an olive branch here. No matter what you say we're going to cyberize your daughter and put her on the front lines. We were only being courteous by offering you compensation. But if you want to act like children then you'll have nothing."

Sakurai nodded to Junk who nodded back. "Guards, take aim. We're removing these two before they can become a problem later."

The pair's eyes widened and even Tanaka looked stunned.

The guards all raised their guns.

"Ready..."

Mako jumped to her husband's side.

"Aim..."

"I love you ken." she whispered.

"I love you too." he whispered back.

Tanaka was panicking inside. He needed to do something.

"Fire!"
114131111113231113112111.title: No Deal

1141311111132311131121111.content:
"Wait!" Tanaka shouted, his voice bringing everything to a grinding halt. Everyone was now staring at the lone general with confusion and curiosity.

"And why is it exactly that we need to stop?" Sakurai asked.

Tanaka was at a loss. He didn't really know, he just blindly acted on instinct. This is why it was important to crunch numbers and exhaust all possible scenarios.

"Yes, wouldn't it be prudent to execute these two now before they become a problem later?" Junko added.

The weary couple flinched at the casual way the blonde scientist spoke of killing them. If it wasn't already clear this woman saw no value in their lives, it was completely confirmed now.

The general didn't know what to do. He had everyone's attention. He'd temporarily staved off the slaughter of innocents. Now he had to find someway to keep the military from making a huge mistake.

"You can't kill them." he said, inwardly sweating bullets at his bold move.

Junko raised an eyebrow. "You still haven't answered as to why. These two spit in the face of our offer and will only become a nuisance later. Immediate termination is the best course of action."

"I agree. Better to get them out of the way now and proceed with our plans."

This wasn't good, Tanaka needed to find some way to persuade them. "But if you kill them then we lose the best leverage we have."

Sakurai looked amused now. "Oh? Please enlighten us Tanaka."

"The cyberization process doesn't guarantee full control of the kaiju." the general began.

Junko looked offended. "How dare you. My project is flawless! I had complete control over Yoshiko when we sent her after Haruka!"

The parents winced at that but the general didn't look deterred. "Ah, but that's where your wrong. I did my own research as well as reviewed the footage and I have to say, you're not as in control as you say you are!"

The look on the blonde's face was venomous. If looks could kill then Tanaka would be dead.

"During the battle, Yoshiko went off more than I think you would've allowed. Not to mention the things she was spewing and taunting Haruka with. She went out of her way to attack her in a more personal way than you'd ever be able to. If you were in control you would've immediately tried to capture her instead of beating her down. Admit it, Yoshiko resisted you!"

Junko looked read to claw the man's eyes out with her bare hands, but was held back by Sakurai. "Please continue."

"If we have Haruka's parents in our grasp she won't even think about resisting. She'll bend the knee and do so gladly. We kill them and she has nothing left to lose. The most dangerous person in the world is the person with nothing left to lose."

Silence filled the room for a brief moment as everyone soaked in what Tanaka was saying. Junko's process was imperfect and the only way to obtain absolute loyalty was through emotional manipulation. Haruka's parents felt sick and Junko still looked pissed as ever. Sakurai on the other hand... clapped. He clapped and clapped as if he was witnessing a college graduation.

"Very good Tanaka my boy. Very good."

"Sir."

"I like what I'm hearing."
1141311111132311131121111.title: Wing it

choices: The cyberization process starts on Haruka

11413111111323111311211111.content:
“Very well General Tanaka, we will take her parents as prisoners for now, but be note that Haruka will have to obey us at some point. Say, let’s go pay Haruka a visit, shall we?” Sakurai said just as he and the guards begin to escort him, Junko, Tanaka, and Haruka’s parents to another part of the base. Haruka’s parents sighed some relief that they are going to only be prisoners for now, but Junko was really upset as she really wanted to have them killed so that they were out of the way. “Don’t worry, you are only still in protective custody right now, but that can soon all change.” He also warned them.

“Well just note that we aren’t agreeing to any deal.” Ken snorted just as he gave an upsetting glare to Sakurai.

“Oh, don’t worry, we are going to take care of that right now as we speak.” Sakurai smiled, knowing he has another way to get to Haruka.

/

Haruka’s eyes were currently opening up and what she sees is some bright light above her, a light for sure. She was currently still beaten up from earlier and felt so weak right now. “Uhhhh.... where am I?” She asked, and then as she tries to move, she couldn’t, as she was restrained in both the arms and legs. She then sees with her more clear eyes that she is tied up by electronic like restrains. She notices she is laying on a flat table. “Can’t get out.” She wondered.

Haruka was currently trapped in the lab room, only a much bigger room as this time they are doing an experiment on a giantess currently, but just as Haruka begins to wake up and noticed her surroundings, a speaker is then activated. “Hello Haruka.” Said by a man’s voice.

“Commander Sakurai, is this you, what are you doing?”

“I was about to ask you the same thing, but at the moment you are tied up in our lab. Well I am going to explain this all to you, so pay attention. You are charged with being a national security threat to our entire country, and quite frankly, the world for that matter.” He said.

“Why so? I never did anything wrong?” She complained just as she struggles.

“Well, I knew you would say that. But to put it like this, you are a 160ft tall young girl with dangerous powers that must be maintained, and for you to have win the people’s blind hearts with your reckless actions and monster like style, just blinds al of them to the bigger picture. I had Yagyu knock you out and capture you for our little experiment that we are about to do to you.”

“What is that?” She asked, now scared.

“Well, first, let me make an offer.” He said, and then right in front of Haruka came a screen, with her parents held hostage with a gun towards their head by the soldiers. “This, is your dilemma, you will agree to our terms here about being transformed into a cyber kaiju, in which we will have access and control to you at all times, and you agree to serve our country as our weapon, and perhaps we might make even more kaijus just like you. Or.... you can refuse, in which case we will... or actually... you will kill your parents right here and now, and don’t bother trying to make any offers or resist us, its one way or the another, and I am sure that your parents will agree with this decision, knowing that it is you who now decides this.”

Haruka was shocked right to her core. Sakurai has her parents at gunpoint, and is forcing her to agree to be turned into a cyber monster or risk her parents and her life. For once she doesn’t know what she can do. Does she agree to this and save her family, or not?

“I don’t know....” she said in tears. “Please don’t harm them, I will do anything for them.” She cried out, heavily in tears.

“So, do we have a deal?” Sakurai reacted.

“Yes.” She said, giving up on resisting.

“Good, good... good.... I promise you, you will really become a monster now.” He said.

What happens now?
11413111111323111311211111.title: A Cruel Choice

choices: Focus on Junko and her project and desires
11413111111323112.content:
Haruka swim across the ocean to head back to her island which is not far from Japan. The government built her the island when she transformed, and she has often lived there to ease the pain of the city being caused destroyed accidentally, and also to have some privacy as living near the city was surely gonna draw crowds to come see her. Right now she has a simple uneasy feeling, a feeling that kinda makes her a bit sick. Is it possible that Junko plans to use her DNA for her own gain, or something worse, maybe something good even. What’s her guess on the matter, who knows.

Right now, she heads in to a cave in the mountain on the island and enters it, following the lights to reach her big bed. Her place also have other amenities, but also waiting for her is her parents, who seemed a bit worried and a little disappointed at her.

“Haruka, where have you been, its quite late?” her mother asked her, knowing that even though that Haruka is a giant, she still worries for her.

“We been wondering when you will show up.” Her dad also added.

“Well had a talk with the general, he wanted to speak to me about someone inside their HQs. Something about a scientist named Junko somehow getting my DNA for some project that she is working on.” Haruka explained to them, and they reacted a bit surprised, but also understandable because given her size and power, she is in a way an asset to the country.

“Oh, I didn’t know. You could have told us somehow.”

“I didn’t want y’all to worry.” Haruka said just as she sat down by their side. She even goes and picks them up and raises them to her head. “Somehow, I kinda feel afraid for once as a giant monster.”

“Why so? I mean you are indestructible, and such.” Her mother reacted, surprised that her giant daughter is afraid. “Maybe they could be some good out of this. I always told you to look sometimes on the bright side of things. Especially when you are a kaiju.

“I know, but something just isn’t right.” Haruka added.

“Well you can tell us.” Her father added.

“Well, was doing some monster poses for the city, then the nice lady Junko who I meet not long ago came in, wanting a pose with me, something about eating her. Did the pose, somehow she was cover in my drool. Always hate that when it happens.” She admits to them. Both her parents gave a chuckle.

“Oh, that pose, it happens all the time I assume.”

“Then the general talk to me on how she got my DNA from it, and is working on cracking it to make something something out of it. Well, like I said, I am afraid a little bit because what if she somehow uses that DNA sample for evil or something.”

“Well I am thinking that will be just fine, besides, nothing can beat you. I mean you are a kaiju, and sometimes, you gotta let loose every once in awhile, and not let your worries get to you. Maybe they might make more like you, and perhaps you can start having friends that are just like you.” Her mother said with some encouragement.

Haruka think for a moment on that statement. Not knowing if she wants to be afraid of the idea of an evil Giantess like her, or the idea of there being more than one kaiju like her, and then she responded. “Maybe you are right, I shouldn’t be too scared.”

So where do we go from here now?

114131111113233.title: A Change of Heart maybe

1141311111133.content:
She'd done it!

She'd actually done it!

She'd finally cracked Haruka's DNA!

Junko eyed her computer screen like a hungry cat who'd cornered it's prey. If what she was reading was correct then she'd have a prototype of Project Monster Hunter 2.0 up and running in a few days.

Finally! All of her hard work was beginning to pay off. Oh how she couldn't wait to show the general and rub his big fat nose in it. The man was going to kittens when he saw her success.

The blonde scientist began breaking down the giantess's DNA virtually and trying to find the best chemical mixture for her project. While the general's was more robot based, hers was going to lean more on the genetic side.

General Tanaka had given her a good starting point and she was going to use every bit of information at her disposal to get the best result possible. The computer cycled through the different types of chemicals for the next hour or so while Junko herself took a temporary break to catch up on some sleep.

When she came to her laptop had finished it's work. She re-adjusted her glasses and read over the new data. When she did her face broke out into a manic grin. This was it!

Project Monster Hunter 2.0 was finally ready to move into phase two.

"This is going to be so much fun!"
1141311111133.title: Junko cracks Haruka's DNA (Time-Skip)

choices: Haruka arrives at the lab looking for the general
11413111111333.content:
General Tanaka knew something was up when he walked into the lab. Junko didn't have her nose buried in her monitor, instead she was standing on top of a table dancing as if she'd won the lottery.

The sight was as humorous as it was odd. "Junko...?"

The blonde instantly stopped and turned her head towards the baffled man. "General!? Oh my god, it's so good to see you!" she smiled before hopping off the table. "I have good news! Big news!"

"What?" Tanaka asked, more than a little put off by Junko's bubbliness.

"I finally cracked that kaiju girl's DNA!" she cheered. "And not even five minutes ago I found the perfect chemical mixture to begin phase two!"

Tanaka's eyebrows nearly shot into his forehead. "Are you serious? You've actually done it!"

"Bingo!" she confirmed. "We can begin phase two of my three phase plan!"

The general was stunned, impressed even. "So are you finally going to tell me the full extent of your plan?"

Junko grinned. "Nope!"

Of course...

*DING!*

"What was that noise?" Tanaka questioned.

"Oh, that? That's the bell to let me know the chemicals are done mixing." Junko answered before walking over to a messy table. She flipped open a steel box and pulled out a glowing orange vile.

"Is that...?"

"Oh yeah! Let's get started."
11413111111333.title: Ready for phase 02?

choices: Haruka gets hit with the rain and grows bigger

114131111113331.content:
"Am I standing in the right spot?" Tanaka asked through his earpiece. The drive into town had been long tiring, yet he couldn't deny his was a bit interested to see the fruits of his labor.

For a little over a month he'd been subjected Junko's presence and forced to spend time with the giant, so whatever the mad scientists plan was had better been worth all his efforts.

"Are you standing atop the Haruka building?" Junko asked from the other end.

"Yes, and I'd like to get this done before the storm hits. The news said there's going to be a huge thunderstorm and I can already see the dark clouds looming overhead."

"Excellent!" Junko cheered on the other end. "Without this storm the plans a no go."

"Pardon?"

"The storm is essential for Project Monster Hunter 2.0. Anyway, you have trigger so when the rain starts to drop, press it." the blonde explained.

The general grumbled. "Fine. But this better be worth it!"

"Oh it will be." Junko giggled. All her hard work was about to pay off.

The pair waited and waited as more and more dark clouds blanketed the sky. It was almost time. Lightning struck, thunder boomed, and then finally the rain fell.

"Now!" Junko ordered.

The general did just that. Quicker than he could blink, an orange drone shot up from the ground below and into the clouds. At first the general was confused by this, but then something ''odd'' happened.

The rain, it turned... orange?

What followed next was a moment the general would never forget. Tanaka watched in horror as the populace down below began to scream. This orange rain clearly causing them distress and discomfort.

"Junko!? Junko!? What the hell is going on!"

"Progress!" she answered before removing her earpiece and stepping outside.

Down below in the city the exposed female civilians began to scream in agony. The males seemed to be fine but that meant little as the piercing screams of pain filled the air.

Then the sound of something tearing. Clothes to be specific. And... where all the females suddenly getting taller?

Indeed they were as the orange rain was causing all the females present to expand in size.

Tanaka saw this and it made his jaw drop in terror. What had he just done!? "No."

Junko meanwhile relished her work as she too was bathing in the orange rain, her body also feeling the effects. Her plan had worked perfectly. Why simply create one giant when you could have an army of giants? With this they were now ahead of every other country in the world...

...Kaiju world!

114131111113331311.content:
It had been quite some time since the Orange Rain incident, and in that time it gave the first of the giantess' time to re-evaluate her situation. At first it was odd seeing others like herm, people that were her size or bigger just wasn't a sight she was used to.

Then there was the woman responsible, the self proclaimed queen of the monsters, Junko. She'd created this whole kaiju situation by stealing her DNA. Haruka didn't know how to feel about that little tidbit of information, but it wasn't like the blonde giant was using her genes for evil.

What should've been complete chaos or the end of the world never came. Instead the world and everyone in it just adapted. Kaiju were now a regular sight to see and have been accommodated by the world government to fit into normal society. That was both surprising and impressive.

Haruka being the first of the kaiju race was made into something of an ambassador of sorts. Because she already had a strong connection to the people, it made sense that she be the one to represent the other giants when at big meetings or special events.

The army had also gone silent since Junko's plan. They were still around, but there presence was next to nil. Even Tanaka seemed to fall off the face of the earth which saddened the resident kaiju girl since she wouldn't be able to go head-to-head with his experiments anymore.

Oh well, she just hoped wherever the former general was, he was doing alright. But one funny moment that did come out of all this was her own mother's reaction. She'd been out in the orange rain and thought she'd grow like the others... only to be left feeling disappointed. No growth for her.

The woman complained and complained and Haruka could remember laughing her head off when she made that pouty face of hers. Even her own father Ken found it hilarious. He would constantly tell her at least they could be small together. Needless to say he slept on the couch a lot more now.

Which brought everything back to Haruka who was lounging on the beach of her island. Today was her day off from all her other obligations and she free to basically do whatever. "Hmm? I wonder what I'm gonna do today?"

Level 1: Obviously the young children in appearance under 13. They are known as the Level 1 kaijus. Let’s be fair, just because they are in one level doesn’t mean they aren’t mature, they can be, but as level 1 monsters, they tend to get the most destructive kaiju like jobs. Level 2: 13-18 teenagers will be higher than level 1, but not quite at level 3. Level 3: This is where Junko is, she and level 3s are adults who have the most powerful over the other levels. They oversee everything and has all the perks of the kaijus levels. They are also involved in government affairs and oversees a city’s protection. This is where things get serious here.

So which level kaijus will you make.

121.content:
"Dice City, if only everything down there was as peaceful as it looks from up here." Gwen mused as she looked down at the citizens and cars below. So far the day had been rather slow and she hadn't seen much action on the streets. In fact the most vile thing she'd seen all day was a purse snatching, and even then the thug didn't get far. He gave up the second he saw her.

That made sense, after all who in their right mind would want to get into a fight with a 68ft woman? The answer, a lot of people at first. They were either very brave or very stupid and Gwen was inclined to believe the latter. They had to be if they believed a few idle threats and bullets would work on her. If anything the petty resistance only served to annoy her.

Still, she couldn't deny the thrill of taking down criminals and the cheers from the people thanking her for her service. Service she wasn't getting paid for by the way. Oh such was the tragic life of a superhero. Although Gwen guessed she couldn't really call her life tragic. Especially since she liked what she was.

Ever since that accident at the chemical plant she'd been rendered a 68ft woman in a big city. A city brimming with crime and criminals that needed to be taken down. So after giving it some thought she dawned her mask and bikini and became a Kaiju style superhero.

It took a little getting used to at first as she would accidently cause some property damage, but at least she took down the bad guys. Hearing the people cheer for her and the thanks she revived from the chief of police, how could she not continue? The mayor even put a division together to pay for property damage so long as she got the bad guys.

Honestly she could say her life was good. "Well there's no use standing around here. Looks like the place is all clear."

133.content:
(Guard station I Location Unknown, 11:30pm)

"Shit, it's freezing out here." Guard A complained.

"Suck it up, Spike." Guard B replied back.

The two had been standing guard out in the dead of night for hours and the began to feel the cold nip at their heels. If there was one thing Spike hated it was the cold and the fact that he and his partner had to stand guard over the wall.

"Sorry, Wallace. It's just... I hate being out here." Spike apologized.

"It's alright, I understand. I complaining ain't gonna get the job done faster."

"I know." Spike sighed.

The two continued to converse as the cool wind brushed across their faces and the still calm over the ocean nearby reflected the light of the full moon.

"So, what are we supposed to be guarding anyway?" Spike asked. "I'm not a regular here some I'm curious. I tried asking around but everyone else's been to tight lipped that I'm beginning to think whatever we're protecting is top secret."

"Ha. You could say that." Wallace grinned.

"Well...?" Spike pushed, his curiosity peaked.

Wallace just continued to grin. "Well I could tell you... but then I'd have to kill you."

Silence hung in the air before the pair started laughing. "No you didn't." Spike smiled.

Wallace simply shrugged his shoulder. "Come on, you set me up for that one."

"Maybe..." Spike chuckled, trying to calm down. "But seriously, what are we guarding."

"Let's just say it's some next level stuff." Wallace said with the upmost seriousness in his voice.

----

"Do you remember the objectives?" A female voice echoed.

*Head nod*

"The mission objectives are as fallows: 1) Eliminate all hostiles, 2) Retrieve the McGuffin, and 3) Rendezvous at the extraction point. Am I clear?"

*Growl of acknowledgment*

"Good. Mission start in 3... 2... 1!"

Still a sight to behold, and I wonder, what if we got to meet a creature like that in sight.” Wallace then said in the process, and then he started to see the waters shifting very violently, and this started getting him worried. “Uh... Spike... you might want to look at this.”

“Well what...” he asked when he looked at the ocean and noticed the waters shifting violently also, and then suddenly a huge wave of water erupted from the area, and for a few moments, the water was so blinding that they couldn’t make note of what being it was. After a few moments, the being revealed to be a towering 160ft bra and panty (pink) clad black haired red eye preteen with the cutest body imaginable. Her towering presence cast a huge shadow over the two soldiers, who looked at her in awe and fear. The giant girl then gave out a growl, looking down viciously at them before given out a very Godzilla like roar. The wave of wind from her roar would knock the soldiers off their feet and send them screaming in terror just as she uses her fire breath to burn them alive, along with some of the buildings nearby. At that point, the base was completely on high alert, and everything would be sent there to stop Koyukizilla.

One interesting question, Koyukizilla smiles and smirks, knowing she got this mission in the bag. But what is the Mcguffin that she is securing?

It’s called Virtual World, here, we will simulate various simulations or objectives and locations, and remember for this training session, don’t feel bad if you mess something up here, it’s our first time doing this new training session.”

She growls happily

“That’s my girl.” The woman said, and suddenly, a bright light flashes in the area.

/

NYC, Daytime

New York City is as busy as always, with people going about their daily lives. Kids going to school, adults going to work, and all on the very busy booming streets of this great city.

A woman was out by an empty dock herself just walking towards the ocean just as it begins to shift violently. The brown hair scientist (remember the link of the previous chapter) look on her binoculars just to see the water beginning to rise as the being erupts. “Right on time.”

The pillar of water erupts to reveal the 9-10 year old body figure of a young black haired pale skin girl with red eyes and a curvy body, with nothing but a pink bra and panties outfit. Towering over buildings in NYC, Koyukizilla roared just as she turns her attention to the lone woman on the docks. The woman was Shea herself, an adoptive mother figure for Koyukizilla, whimuse her own DNA to help make her, giving her a psychic bond with her. While the military wants to purely use Koyukizilla as a weapon, Shea wants her to have as much of a normal life as possible, and even explore having fun in other ways.

“Koyukizilla, I am down here.” She’s yelled on her microphone.

Koyukizilla roared just as she bends down and grabs the woman with her hand, being careful not to crush her. She brings her up to her face and smiles just as she places her in her shoulder. “Alright, here is what we are doing today Koyukizilla?”

1351.content:
"Our goal for today is for you to learn how to navigate through a huge city." the doctor began.

*Growl of acknowledgement*

Shea smiled. "Now remember that this is a simulation so if you do make a mistake it's not a big deal. Just keep your mind focused and your eyes on the prize."

*Head nod*

"Don't sweat it, I'll be here for support if you need me." Shae waved. "Now here's the goal. Since this is a simulated New York City, it'll be easy to mark certain goals and milestones. You need to make it from where we are now to that really tall building over there."

*Growls and points*

Shea watched where Kyoukizilla pointed to and nodded. "Yeah, that one. That's called the Empire State Building. I remember the first time I ever saw it was in the movie King Kong that my grandfather had me watch. He loved ridiculous movies like that."

*Growls softly*

Dr. Shea rubs Kyoukizilla's shoulder gently and made the giant purr. "Maybe once al this is done we can visit the big apple for real. It is the city of dreams after all."

*Growls*

"Yeah..." shea nods. "Maybe I'll even get to show you the statue of liberty?"

1352.content:
"Alright Koyukizilla, today we're going to test out your powers by having you demolish this simulated city. Do you understand?"

*Grunt*

"Alright then, have fun and go crazy." Dr. Shea smiled.

The Kaiju nodded before tensely eyeing the virtual city before her eyes. All around her were buildings, cars, people, and billboards. The giant roared a monstrous roar and took a deep breath.

Dr. Shea held on tight to the giant's clothing as she maneuvered her body. Judging by the way she was inhaling air, she had a pretty good idea of about what was about to happen next.

The air around her began to grow hot as Koyukizilla puffed her cheeks. "Here it comes."

The doctor braced herself as stream of white hot flame erupted from the giant's mouth. The heat was so intense that Dr. Shea could actually hear the air sizzle.

"Amazing!"

By the time the flames died down the doctor was nearly left speechless. The flame had covered a whole ten kilometers!

*ROAR!*

Dr. Shea didn't kknow what to make of it. Just how powerful was Koyukizilla that she could cover ten whole kilometers so quickly?

"Oh. My. God.

14.title: Leumya, The Kaiju Police

145.content:
Leumya Temitazi was no stranger to top secret missions. They didn't come frequently, but often enough. Only this time something was different, there was an air of seriousness in the meeting hall that was never present before. Currently she was sat at a desk with someone she'd become really familiar with over the years...Agent Mullen.

The man was near emotionless and had a layer of slime to him that honestly made her want to puke, but at the same time he was trusted enough to get whatever task assigned to him completed. Right now though he had a deathly serious look on his face and seemed to be irritated about something.

By his side were two different monitors that were currently displaying static. The whole setup could be described as odd.

Leumya was broken from her thoughts when the agent's watch began to buzz. When it did, the two T.V Monitors came to life. On one monitor was Dr. Shea Tetlor, the handler for Koyukizilla. And other was none other than General Tanaka from Japan. That came as a surprise consider the U.S and Japan were currently in a rivalry for Kaiju weapons.

"Alright, this meeting can now begin." Agaent Mullen began. "Can the two of you here me?" he asked to the monitors.

"Hai." the general nodded.

"Loud and clear." said Dr. Tetlor.

"Good. I trust you both remember Ms. Temitazi?" Mullen reminded.

Both guests nodded.

"Very good." Mullen whispered. "Now it's time to get started. The reason for this meeting is discuss a top secret mission between Mega-Lily, Harukazilla, and Koyukizilla."

"What?" Leumya questioned. This was new. The other's seemed to share the sentiment.

"A top secret mission with three Kaiju?" Dr. Shae gasped. "Out of the question! Three Kaiju together would be too destructive and near impossible to keep under wraps."

"Agreed!" Said the general. "Too destructive, the world couldn't handle that much power."

"Maybe, but it's going to have to if the information that's come across my desk is legit." Mullen stated gravely.

"What information?" Leumya dared ask.

Mullen paused as everyone waited in anticipation. "A brand new Kaiju has been born!"

The room was suddenly in an uproar. "What did you say!?"

"Impossible!?"

"It can't be!"

"That's right." Mullen stated. "The information that's come across my desk says as much. A brand new Kaiju has been born, stronger than anything we've ever known."

Leumya was stunned.

"My god." Tanaka breathed.

"A brand new Kaiju." Shae repeated. "Who gave birth to this new monster?"

"A dark division somewhere in Thailand. Apparently they've been working on this project for years to compete with the Japan and America Kaiju arms race."

"How powerful?" The general asked.

"We don't know."

"How big?" Shae asked.

"We don't know that either."

"What's it look like?" Leumya finally asked.

"Female." Mullen answered. "That's all we do know. We don't have any pictures or data."

"That's too little to work with. For all we know this could be some kind of ploy." Tanaka sneered.

"I know what you're thinking general, but this is too big to ignore. If this is real then we're all doomed unless we combine our resources." Mullen argued.

"We're in." Shae said firmly. "If this thing is real then we're not taking any chances. Koyukizilla and I are in!"

"So am I!" Leumya added. "I'll fight!"

"Well general...? How about you?"

The older man grunted. "Fine! We'll send Harukazilla in! But this better not be a trick!"

"Trust me. You all will be rewarded for this." Mullen sighed.

"We better." Tanaka growled. "We'll drop Harukazilla off!"

His monitor went blank.

"I'll see to it Koyukizilla gets there as well." Shae smiled before her monitor went blank.

"Get comfortable Mega-Lily. You're team's on there way.
145.title: Top Secret Mission

Name: Sayuki Maysakuri
Kaiju Name: Queen Sayuki, Titanica, many other names, but those our popular
Age: 12 almost 13 in appearance, but 100s of years old in actual age
Height: Has thenpower to shift from 50ft to 1000ft tall, often she is 200ft
Appearance: Has pale skin, medium length bluish-greenish black hair, and red eyes. For a girl her age, she had a body that most people would die for, with big breasts and a cute butt. Often wears an ancient form of a lavender two piece swimsuit, but has been seen wearing royal dresses (not the best in describing appearances)

Background Story: Note that this is a fictional alternative timeline. Sayuki Maysakuri was the daughter of the Japanese emperor Matoks Maysakuri during the feudal era where their family ruled Japan and ensure peace and prosperity for all. Sayuki one day came down with a mysterious illness and no one knows who it was, but all they knew is that Matoks thought this was an attempt by his enemies to sabotage their rule. So he ordered his army to defeat them and bring them to justice. When that was done, turns out that there was a witch who was among them who knows of the cure for his daughter. Matoks was willing to do anything to save her, and accepted this. The daughter was cured, but soon the effects of her magic would take into place. When she was young, she would tower all of those and developed strange abilities. The people at first feared her, but the family refused to give her up, and stayed with her until her 12th birthday. The 12th birthday would soon be a horrifying reveal. The witch comes back and reveals that she has given her goddess like abilities with her magic, and that on her 12th birthday, she would be forever cursed with her abilities, never being able to age past her appearance. She would forever be cursed to become a giant goddess with powers. The father then ordered the witch executed for cursing his daughter, but the witch tells him on her execution that it can never be undone, she will outlive all of them, and her whole family would end.

Little did they know, the witch was right. Young Sayuki would soon be the only one in the family left after many years, but during that time the people, who became feared of her powers and abilities, and her immense size, would soon bow to her as their goddess, out of fear that she might do something to do. She didn’t want this life, but she ultimately took it. She would soon be the Queen of Japan, ruling it to current day, protecting its people from war, and soon she would have to deal with problems from the other nations on her rule of the country. Some says that she is a dictator, some says that she is a kind and just queen. Its all up for the writer to decide, but one thing is certain, she rules Japan.
Additional Info: During her years, she came to enjoy being a goddess and having power over the people, so that is why with the neutral route, she could have some fun if she wishes. She loves the feeling of people bowing before her, but is a kind person when she needs to be.

So where to start?

1523.content:
The moon shown brightly over the skies of Japan, it's white light a contrast against the starry night sky. Down below the city was abuzz with song and dance. Rather than standard streetlights, torches had been lit and everyone dressed ceremoniously in their finest robes and kimonos.

Tonight was a night of celebration. Tonight was the Maysakuri Festival. It was a tradition that was started way back when when Emperor Matoks first born came into the world. On this special day once every year, everyone would host a festival in his daughter's honor and dress their best. It was a time of smiles, games, food, and worship. There was even a play that detailed the legend of Sayuki... the imortal empress of Japan.

Currently every man, woman, and child was dressed in their finest garb and headed towards Sayuki mountain. It was the largest mountain in all of Japan and currently the residence of the empress. The event was also being televised for those who couldn't make it.

Atop the tallest mountain sat a golden castle, larger than any structure that came before it. It was Maysakuri home and over the years it had been redone and expanded multiple times. It was a beautiful home and stood so high in the sky it reminded most of a Disney castle at times.

Inside though, the girl of honor looked out her window at the bright lights headed her way. Her little worshipers were coming to greet her like they did every year. She had the world record for the most festival attendances since she never missed one. Honestly without her it would feel like the end of an era.

"I guess I should get ready, my guests will be here soon."

info.brief_description: A revival of my old Girlzilla Giantess Monsters Story. New rules and updates! Read and add
info.description:
Alright, UltimateGiantess here. I was the original creator of the Girlzilla Giantess Monsters, and just recently looking at what I am doing lately with my stories and what not. I figured that it was time that this story got rebooted and I am now gonna start off with a new clean slate for the story here. So here it is.

Now a disclaimer here, they will be children characters as the option is allowed, but they will be rules to prevent total going of overboard for these characters. Please don’t take it personally, I am just trying to keep the few fans out there who want to add this type of stuff going, There.

Basically what happens if you take the giant monster kaiju stuff and you mix in the giantess stuff. Well you get Girlzilla, Giantess Monsters. Here the girls can rampage cities, or defend them. Or try to live a normal life. I know I have a similar story to this with A Typical Life of a Kaiju Giantess, but here the options are all out, you can defend or destroy. Want good, want bad, or something in between, you got it.

Now time for the rules.

No Male Giants
No sexual stuff or nudity for kids under 13, they have to be at least in a swimsuit in that case. Any older is allowed to have nudity and heavier sexual acts.
No scat or toilet stuff
No unbirth
Make sure you follow the format closely and make sure that your writing is nicely detail and at least have a paragraph or two, fail and I either edit or delete your stuff.
Have fun, and they can be more than one giantess.
Also, for the first time ever.... furries and robots are allowed

Here is the format

Name:
Kaiju Name:
Age:

Appearance:
